String.string: Hunt {@LinkCreature:24#5#swift storm lizards} on {@Rgn:24001#Aurum Road} and deliver lizard skin to {@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} in Velika.
Hunt {@LinkCreature:24#9#desert lightning kumases} in {@Rgn:24001#Aurum Road} and deliver collected items to {@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} in Velika.
Hunt {@LinkCreature:24#12#covetous vulcans} in {@Rgn:24001#Aurum Road} and deliver collected items to {@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} in Velika.
Hunt {@LinkCreature:24#62#yearning vulcans} in {@Rgn:24001#Aurum Road} and deliver collected items to {@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} in Velika.
